BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Submitting the name of Ms. Andrea Bierstein to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her appointment to the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 2301 of the New York City Charter.
Items.MatterName: Ms. Andrea Bierstein, New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Submitting the name of Ms. Maria Almonte-Weston to the City Council for advice and consent regarding her appointment as a Commissioner of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission, pursuant Section 9-207 of the New York City Administrative Code and Section 271 of the New York State Correction Law.
Items.MatterName: Ms. Maria Almonte-Weston, a Commissioner of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Submitting the name of Mr. George Goodmon to the City Council for advice and consent regarding his appointment as a Commissioner of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission, pursuant Section 9-207 of the New York City Administrative Code and Section 271 of the New York State Correction Law.
Items.MatterName: Mr. George Goodmon, a Commissioner of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor – Submitting the name of Mr. Yves Filius to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment to the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission, pursuant to Sections 31 and 2301 of the New York City Charter.
Items.MatterName: Mr. Yves Filius, New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission
